title: Matchsafe, "Floral Repoussé Decoration", ca. 1875
markings: S. KIRK & SON 11OZ (and small impressed flower or 4-leaf clover to right of OZ)
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, rounded sides and corners, featuring over-all repoussé floral decoration on stippled ground; reverse features some variation in floral decoration with monogram "EM" engraved in small, open, central reserve. Small protruding button on side opens lid when depressed; lid hinged on opposite side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Floral Repoussé Decoration", ca. 1875.
ca. 1875. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-1182.
